name: phpMyBackend-PHP/MySQL Backend Generator
short_description:
phpMyBackend is a backend generator written in PHP/MySQL to generate a ready to use backend. 
It\'s a full functional backend which has the most features: add/delete/modify, field sorting, field search, image upload and thumbnail.
